description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for a birthday form dialog, allowing users to input a person's name, select a birth date, and set a reminder period. It interacts with a provider to add a new birthday entry.

classes.name: BirthdayFormDialog
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a dialog for adding a new birthday, including name input, date picker, and reminder settings.

classes.name: _BirthdayFormDialogState
classes.description: State class managing the form state, user input, date selection, and form submission for the BirthdayFormDialog.

methods.name: _selectDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker to select the birthday date and updates the state.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Validates the form and, if valid, calls the provider to add a new birthday, then dismisses the dialog.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Releases resources held by text controllers.
